evidence.text: WallStreetSilver community hits 500k members! Physical silver squeeze gaining momentum. Dealers reporting record retail demand and supply shortages.
COMEX silver inventories dropping fast. If retail keeps buying at this pace, we'll see 2021 squeeze 2.0. Stack while you can!
#SilverSqueeze trending again. Retail investors coordinating physical silver purchases to expose paper market manipulation.
Bloomberg: Social media-driven silver buying frenzy causes premiums to spike 25% over spot. Mints struggle to keep up with retail demand.
Just bought 100oz from my local dealer. He says he's never seen demand like this. Silver to $50 is inevitable.
